title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Zero to Millions: Building Real-Time Applications at Scale (API312)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从零到百万：大规模构建实时应用程序 (API312)
abstract: Discover how to scale real-time applications to millions of users with modern event-driven architectures. Learn essential strategies for managing high-volume connection requests, implementing effective filtering patterns, and handling event distribution at scale. We'll explore integration patterns for event processing, practical solutions for GenAI applications, and optimization techniques for operating at production scale. Join us to understand connection rate management, filtering strategies, and real-world architectural patterns for building highly scalable real-time applications.
abstract_cn: 了解如何使用现代事件驱动架构将实时应用程序扩展到数百万用户。学习管理大量连接请求的基本策略、实施有效的过滤模式以及大规模处理事件分发。我们将探讨事件处理的集成模式、GenAI应用程序的实用解决方案以及在生产规模下运行的优化技术。加入我们，了解连接速率管理、过滤策略以及构建高度可扩展实时应用程序的实际架构模式。
